description: Get the runtime information that was logged for a specific runtime instance of the lifecycle policy.

parameters.name: lifecycleExecutionId
parameters.description: Use the unique identifier for a runtime instance of the lifecycle policy to get runtime details.

nested_items.name: lifecycleExecution
nested_items.description: Runtime details for the specified runtime instance of the lifecycle policy.

nested_items.name: lifecycleExecutionId
nested_items.description: Identifies the lifecycle policy runtime instance.

nested_items.name: lifecyclePolicyArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the lifecycle policy that ran.

nested_items.name: resourcesImpactedSummary
nested_items.description: Contains information about associated resources that are identified for action by the runtime instance of the lifecycle policy.

nested_items.name: hasImpactedResources
nested_items.description: Indicates whether an image resource that was identified for a lifecycle action has associated resources that are also impacted.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The runtime status of the lifecycle execution.

nested_items.name: reason
nested_items.description: The reason for the current status.

nested_items.name: startTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the lifecycle runtime instance started.

nested_items.name: endTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the lifecycle runtime instance completed.
